question: Electronics and IT Ministry is to collaborate with which company to set up a Quantum Computing Applications Lab?
explanation:
The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has announced to set up a Quantum Computing Applications Lab in association with Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Through this step, the researchers in educational institutions or start-up ecosystem, will get access to quantum computing hardware, simulators, and programming tools through Amazon Braket service, at no cost.
